title: Empathy-Based Collaborative Instructional Design Creativity Development for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and secondary education curriculum comprehension
context.additional_context: Language arts course for in-service secondary teachers to conduct project-based assessments in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more systematic processes for analyzing learner needs using empathy strategies
Learners can perform five or more creative interactions during the collaborative idea generation and selection process.
Learners can complete an instructional design portfolio reflecting the cyclical process of problem definition-idea development-design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
